creator: giulio.verzini@gmail.com
text:
Hi All,

i've got problem whit mod_jk module.
I want to forward from apache to tomcat the jsp request; with mod_jk this run, 
but I have problem with session affinity. When I open a page, i can obtain a 
SessionID but if i click on a link to another page (on the same tomcat 
server), my SessionID was change!

Thqnks a lot for your attention!
Regards 
Giulio Verzini

First of all this is not an httpd server related issue, but a mod_jk issue. As I
do not know you current mod_jk version I cannot fill out the version accordingly.
Product should be Tomcat5.
As you do not describe any details of your configuration please make sure that
everything is configured correctly according to
http://tomcat.apache.org/connectors-doc/. If you have questions regarding this
documentation, please have a look at the users@tomcat.apache.org mailing list.
Otherwise please come back with your mod_jk configuration.
creator: rpluem@apache.org

text:
Hi, 

thanks a lot for yopur attention.
I've found an interesting document on http://tomcat.apache.org/connectors-doc/ 
and resolve my bug!

I change the bug state to FIXED.
Regards

Giulio Verzini
creator: giulio.verzini@gmail.com

text:
Maybe nitpicking, but as this had been a configuration problem I change the
status to RESOLVED INVALID.
creator: rpluem@apache.org
